mapper.select: SELECT c.conversationId, c.firstMessage, c.createdAt AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS createdAt, c.lastMessageAt AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS lastMessageAt FROM cid c INNER JOIN uidcid uc ON c.conversationId = uc.conversationId WHERE uc.uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT uuid FROM uidcid WHERE conversationId = #{conversationId} LIMIT 1
